item.title: SSR Mining Final Project
item.description: Below is the code submitted by the SSR Mining project team. If the code below does not load, you can instead view the Gist on gist.github.com.

item.title: SNC-Lavalin Final Project
item.description: This is the final project presentation by the SNC-Lavalin project team. A pdf download of the slides submitted by the SNC-Lavalin project team is available here. An executable file for the presentation is available here.

item.title: Comm100 Final Project
item.description: This is the final project presentation by the Comm100 project team. A pdf download of the slides submitted by the Comm100 project team is available here.

item.title: CloudPBX Final Project
item.description: This is the final project presentation by the CloudPBX project team. A pdf download of the slides submitted by the CloudPBX project team is available here, and a webapp visualization is available on Julian Mentasti’s website. Finally, a gist of a portion of the group’s code is available here as Jupyter notebooks. --
